description: Presets are useful for saving time and maintaining photo appearance coherence. They allow you to save adjustments you have made to an image and apply them to other images.
To export a preset, right-click a preset and select "Export," name the PDADJ file, and click Save .
NOTE: You can share and back up PDADJ preset files by uploading them to DirectorZone through PhotoDirector. You can also download presets from DirectorZone, as well.
